name: slower than light
description:
Explore your derelict ship, try to warp out of danger, or stand and fight and try not to blow up.

Controls:

  • Arrow keys move
  • Spacebar toggles buttons and switches
  • F toggles your flashlight

Warning: there'll probably be bugs, in the fine tradition of Jam Games.  This is more or less a silly mega demake of FTL.  There's a lot left to do to really polish it off but a lot of the basic systems are in place.
